author: Brenda Goh
title: In China's Hubei, uncertainty, pessimism and hope as life resumes
description: Li Yu is happy she sold six pieces of roasted corn on the day she reopened her stall after travel restrictions were lifted in Jingzhou, but she worries about the future of her business near the city's ancient wall, a tourist attraction in Hubei province.
